The platform to store your JSON objects.
Works great with

OpenWS makes you develop web applications faster, no server-side knowledge required. Proudly built by developers for developers.

What's OpenWS?

OpenWS is a brand new platform for web-developers to store JSON objects through a simple REST API. No server-side knowledge required.

IT'S FLEXIBLE

Support for POST, PUT, GET and DELETE methods

IT'S SAFE

SSL 128-bit encryption

IT'S EASY TO USE

No downloads / No scripts / No SDK

Get started in seconds

Follow the steps to use the API with AngularJS.

  1. Create an account for free

    to get your API KEY

  2. Save your first JSON object 
                
  ...
  var = taskJSON = {
    name: "My first task",
    completed: false
  };

  $http.post("https://openws.herokuapp.com/my_tasks?apiKey=YOUR_API_KEY", taskJSON)
  .success(function() {
    $log.debug("Task saved successfuly");
  });
  ...
  3. Retrieving all your JSON objects 
                  
  ...
  $http.get("https://openws.herokuapp.com/my_tasks?apiKey=YOUR_API_KEY")
  .success(function() {
    $log.debug("Task saved successfuly");
  });
  ...
  4. More...

    Signup to know more on updating, deleting and querying data

Works great with...

Who's behind OpenWS, and more about it

OpenWS is new, it means there are a lot of improvements to be done. And I'm releasing them as soon as possible.

The main objective of OpenWS is to provide a service so that front-end devs don't need to spend time building the server-side to persist and retrieve data. Instead, they only need to focus on their job on the UI.

If you have suggestions to improve it, please do contact me directly via twitter @roshiro.

If you like the idea of OpenWS, I'd like you to help me spread the word...

- Rafael Oshiro
